name: Universe Millionaire: The New Era of Energy
name_original: Universe Millionaire: The New Era of Energy
description:
The main story revolves around the opportunities and challenges of human settlement and development in outer space, allowing players to experience a variety of gameplay, such as personal growth, strategic management, and cooperative exploration. And that final goal is waiting for every player to unlock.

Players explore the universe in a relaxed state, experience the world of interstellar civilization, and stimulate players' enthusiasm for exploring the unknown and technological progress in real life.

Relaxed and social - Relaxed games are ideal for relaxing during breaks, social interaction with friends, and no fatigue after intense adversarial games.

The establishment of world outlook and values - this is not only a simple game, but also full of emotional exchanges and changes in thinking between people. Relax in the game and find meaning in moving forward bravely in life.
- The game adopts the classic Monopoly game mechanics, adding various interstellar elements, such as planet exploration, base building, and resource management. With the addition of hidden levels, the game has more possibilities. Every choice may affect the ultimate success or failure.
- Different characters have different abilities and carry their own missions. The player needs to choose the corresponding character to enter the game, give full play to the character characteristics, and pursue the ending they want.
- The game gradually increases in difficulty, requiring good strategic planning and resource management skills, as well as the courage and wisdom to deal with various events.
- The open ending allows the game to be more than just one box, allowing you to play the game to your advantage, form alliances with players, or fight enemies. Your goal, after all, is to be the ultimate winner.
